metadata.title: CVE-2013-4492 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in exceptions.rb in the i18n gembefore 0.6.6 for Ruby allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via a crafted I18n::MissingTranslationData.new call.

criterions.comment: ruby-i18n package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
